description: Least odd prime divisor of p(n) - 1, or 1 if p(n) - 1 is a power of 2.
comments: Note that a(n)=1 for n= 1,2,3,7,55,6543, ... . - _Michel Marcus_, Oct 01 2013
prog: (PARI) a(n) = my(p = prime(n) - 1, v = p/(2^valuation(p, 2))) ; if (v == 1, 1, factor(v)[1, 1]); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Oct 01 2013
author: _Clark Kimberling_
